text: Sydney Hillel Schanberg (January 17, 1934 - July 9, 2016) was an American journalist. He was best known for his coverage of the war in Cambodia. He has been the recipient of a Pulitzer Prize in 1976 for his reporting on the war. Schanberg died on July 9, 2016 in Poughkeepsie, New York on July 9, 2016 from a heart attack, aged 82. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American war correspondents Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Writers from Massachusetts
title: Sydney Schanberg
